alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 5:38AM CDT until June 14 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LOGAN...SOUTHEASTERN JOHNSON...NORTHEASTERN YELL AND SOUTHERN POPE COUNTIES... At 537 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Knoxville, or 9 miles east of Clarksville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Lamar... Dover... London... Knoxville... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Lake Dardanelle... Galla Creek WMA... Taral... Holman... Augsburg... Holla Bend... Lutherville... Piney Bay Recreation Area... Pleasant Valley in Pope County... Gum Log... Caglesville... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
